00120             inline const Real getHeight(const Real x, const Real z) const 
00121             {
00122                 assert (z < mSize && x < mSize);
00123                 assert (mHeightData);                
00124                 const unsigned int Pos = static_cast< unsigned int > (z * mSize + x);
00125                 assert (mMaxArrayPos > Pos);
00126                 return mHeightData[ Pos ];    
00127             };
00128 
00129             inline const Real getHeight(const unsigned int x, const unsigned int z) const 
00130             {
00131                 assert (mHeightData);
00132                 assert (z < mSize && x < mSize);
00133                 const unsigned int Pos = static_cast <unsigned int> (z * mSize + x);
00134                 assert (mMaxArrayPos > Pos);
00135                 return mHeightData[ Pos ];  
00136             };
00137 
00138             inline const Real getHeight(const int x, const int z) const 
00139             {
00140                 assert (mHeightData);
00141                 assert (static_cast< unsigned int >(z) < mSize && static_cast< unsigned int >(x) < mSize);
00142                 const unsigned int Pos = static_cast< unsigned int >(z * mSize + x);
00143                 assert (mMaxArrayPos > Pos);
00144                 return mHeightData[ Pos ]; 
00145             };
